channel.title: demo on Be a producer not a consumer
channel.description: Recent content in demo on Be a producer not a consumer

item.title: Demo
item.description: Java public class Main{ private final static String name="foobar"; } JavaScript var i = 1; JS class ShoppingList extends React.Component { render() { return ( <div className="shopping-list"> <h1>Shopping List for {this.props.name}</h1> <ul> <li>Instagram</li> <li>WhatsApp</li> <li>Oculus</li> </ul> </div> ); } } // Example usage: <ShoppingList name="Mark" />
